NAME.Nominative: Monday of the Sixth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Monday of the Sixth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: This is the terrible day, O God, the evening of which we did not hope to attain; but in Thy love for mankind Thou hast vouchsafed us to behold it, O rice-Holy One, glory to Thee.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Let the heart of them be glad that seek the Lord.
Let the heart of them be glad that seek the Lord.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O give thanks unto the Lord and call upon His name.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Blessed is the Lord God of Israel,
SEXTE.STICHOS: O give thanks unto the Lord, for He is good, for His mercy endureth for ever.
